column1: Nothing. Still a student without income.
I intend to donate, but it is a consideration I need to take carefully due to financial circumstances and pressures this year in particular
10 % og my total income after taxes. (No tax reduction)
i m thinking about doing the pledge
More than half when taxes are included
10% of my income which is highly variable due to freelance work

The same as last year from our joint account (via regular giving) along with 10-15% of whatever I earn, which varies (I work zero hours contract and in April began a regular contract too, as well as doing some tutoring) as of Jan the plan has been to review my income every two months and to give a minimum of 10%, rounded up to the nearest <e5><a3>5 or <e5><a3>10. This is a small proportion but is an increase on previous giving, especially as my personal income has doubled over the past year and I hope it will continue to grow. I intend to work more hours and give a larger proportion away. I am quite a selfish person and conflicted between my own desires and giving to others. I found joy in being able to give in the early months of this year, I realise it is my.moral obligation, and I hope to be able to more in future
